text: Do not use fake eyelashes, fake nails, or any other possible fake body addition. We want to appreciate the most natural version of ourselves possible. And for the participants to understand physical beauty is an opinion which will vary on every person’s eyes. It is important for us to appreciate the benefits of the use of our body parts. The one wise nature chose for us. Thank you.

Become aware of the music you’re listening to. Become aware of the lyrics of thus and the effect it has on your behavior.  Listen to healing vibrational sounds. No screen devices use an hour before and after bed.
Click the link to watch the video and get general knowledge about the history and culture of Thailand.
Book the flight to Surat Thani instead of Koh Samui for economic price.

Type “Learn Thai with ThaiPod101.com” listen to some videos and practice with friends. The most important basic phrases are “hello” and “thank you”. (We will practice them on the chat). It really does make a difference when you accept the culture of the country that is welcoming you. Thai people are so beautiful and naturally easy to smile. With these additional simple phrases those smiles will intencify. It’s very rewarding.
